description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The paper pencil game of SOS.  You and your opponent take turns placing either an S or an O on the grid.  Score points by getting an SOS. Challenge the computer in single player mode, or take on up to 3 friends local, system link or on XBOX LIVE.
description.short: The paper pencil game of SOS.  You and your opponent take turns placing either an S or an O on the grid.  Score points by getting an SOS. Challenge the computer in single player mode, or take on up to 3 friends local, system link or on XBOX LIVE.
